mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(replyno, recordno, reviewerno, record, rdate) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{recordno}, #{reviewerno}, #{record}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, recordno, reviewerno, record, rdate FROM reply ORDER BY replyno DESC

SELECT r.replyno, r.recordno, r.reviewerno, m.reviewername AS reviewername, r.record, r.rdate FROM reply r JOIN reviewer m ON r.reviewerno = m.reviewerno WHERE r.recordno = #{recordno} ORDER BY r.replyno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET record=#{record} WHERE replyno = #{replyno}
